snippet: President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela said Sunday that a tumor removed from his pelvic region was malignant, indicating that the cancer he was treated for last summer had returned.
abstract: Venezuela's Pres Hugo Chavez says that tumor he had removed from his pelvic region is malignant, indicating that the cancer he was treated for in 2011 has returned.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela said Sunday that a tumor removed from his pelvic region was malignant, indicating that the cancer he was treated for last summer had returned.

headline.seo: Hugo Chávez Says Tumor Was Malignant
